pr_title: XRDDEV-1457: Fix broken certificate details link

timeline.message: XRDDEV-1457: Fix broken certificate details link

timeline.author: jansu76

replies.bodyText:
Whenever a keys usage -field is undefined. I'm not expert on how that can happen but it is possible when a hardware tokens keys certificate is not imported.
That kind of logic may cause bugs as if usage is undefined the logic goes to else block which could be though as the block for KeyUsageType.AUTHENTICATION.
replies.author: TJaakkola

replies.bodyText: I agree that this would be an improvement, but I'm a bit hesitant whether such refactoring should be done in this task?
replies.author: TJaakkola

replies.bodyText: I thought about it and ninja-removed my comment. It is not as simple as that, indeed. Better not change it too fast, I'll slack more details.
replies.author: jansu76

replies.bodyText:
This comment is better handled in a separate ticket, I will create one.
This PR seems good to go.
replies.author: jansu76
